trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> objects that collectively make up the geometry of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 对象的集合，这些对象共同构成了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry" /> 的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 但如所述，此类的成员的行为如下所述完全<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>文档。

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection> class provides several special features: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection> objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能：**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection>类提供了一些特殊功能：<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection>可以声明对象，为在多个对象，进行只读的以提高之间共享性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.target: XAML 隐式集合用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: A space-delimited list of drawing commands, starting with a move-to command.
trans-unit.target: 用空格分隔绘图命令，从移动到命令的列表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Path Markup Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[路径标记语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md)概述。

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects, declared using object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>声明使用对象元素语法的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> objects which collectively make up the geometry of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shapes.Path" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 对象的集合，这些对象共同构成了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Shapes.Path" /> 的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> class that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化包含指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collection" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collection" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The initial capacity of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的初始容量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> class that can initially contain the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化最初可能包含指定数量的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合的末尾添加一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象派生自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，使用它们时都将复制它们。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，更高版本，你可能无法检索或删除<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>添加到集合使用原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>集合中是一份原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>和被认为是不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>比你添加的一个。

trans-unit.source: This implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 此实现引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果你尝试添加**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: This method does not change the capacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会更改的容量<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> being queried for.
trans-unit.target: 所查询的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合是否包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合项将复制到其中的数组。

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>array</c> at which to start copying the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>array</c> 的索引，将从此处开始复制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> to a one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 从目标数组的指定索引处开始将整个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 复制到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 类型的一维数组中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the source <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of the destination <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 源 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中的项数大于从 <paramref name="index" /> 到目标 <paramref name="array" /> 结尾的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of path figures contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中包含的路径图形数。

trans-unit.source: The number of path figures contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中包含的路径图形数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可循环访问集合的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Enumerator" /> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个可以循环访问集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Enumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中查找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire collection.
trans-unit.target: 在整个集合中搜索指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />，并返回第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中找到，则为 <paramref name="value" /> 的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The collection is searched forward starting at the first <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> and ending at the last <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个开始向前搜索集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>和最后一个结束<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间成正比的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法为 O (*n*) 操作，其中*n*等同于<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection.Count%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The index position at which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 所插入到的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> object to insert in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中插入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> into a specific location within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的特定位置插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的典型实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此实现引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果你尝试插入**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> at the specified index position.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is not a valid index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中的有效索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The string that is converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> created from a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 返回根据指定字符串创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.target: 从 <paramref name="source" /> 中创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 标识要从集合中移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 中移除了 <paramref name="value" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> 具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> 的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" /> at the specified index position from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定索引位置处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是只读的，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigureCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
